statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); project_name=$(basename "$project_dir"); context_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size'); current_input=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage.input_tokens // 0'); current_output=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage.output_tokens // 0'); cache_read=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage.cache_read_input_tokens // 0'); current_total=$((current_input + current_output + cache_read)); current_k=$(awk -v total="$current_total" 'BEGIN {printf "%.0f", total / 1000}'); context_k=$(awk -v size="$context_size" 'BEGIN {printf "%.0f", size / 1000}'); block_time=""; if command -v ccusage &> /dev/null; then ccusage_output=$(ccusage statusline 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$ccusage_output" ]; then block_time=$(echo "$ccusage_output" | grep -oE '[0-9]+h [0-9]+m left' || echo "$ccusage_output" | grep -oE '[0-9]+m left' || echo ""); if [ -n "$block_time" ]; then block_time=" | \\033[35m$block_time\\033[0m"; fi; fi; fi; printf "\\033[33m%s\\033[0m | \\033[36m%s\\033[0m | \\033[34m%sk/%sk\\033[0m%s" "$project_name" "$model" "$current_k" "$context_k" "$block_time"
